case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
quoteText: You must be 13 years old or older to use or access the Service

case: You can opt out of promotional communications
quoteText: We might email you important messages and information we think you’ll find useful. We will stop sending you promotional materials if you tell us you’re not interested.

case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
quoteText: You are solely responsible for the activity that occurs on your account, and you must keep your account password secure.

case: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
quoteText: unless you are under 13 years old and your use of the Service is directly supervised by your parent or guardian or another authorized adult (e.g., a teacher) who agrees to be bound by this Agreement.
